steps.description: Step 1: Navigate to Excel Web - Ensure we're on Excel Web with authentication - The synthetic UX designer navigated to Excel Web interface and completed authentication. The designer observed the interface loading process, authentication flow, and initial state of the Excel Web environment. The designer noted the responsiveness of the navigation and any visual inconsistencies during the loading process.

Step 2: Click New Workbook - Click the 'Blank workbook' text to create a new workbook - The designer clicked on the 'Blank workbook' option to create a new Excel document. The designer observed the transition between the selection interface and the new workbook environment, noting the smoothness of the transition and any unexpected behaviors during the workbook creation process.

steps.step_name: Wait for Excel to Launch in New Window
steps.description: Step 3: Wait for Excel to Launch in New Window - Wait for Excel to launch in new window after clicking 'Blank workbook' - The designer waited for Excel to fully launch in a new window or iframe. During this waiting period, the designer observed the loading animations, interface initialization, and the time taken for the interface to become fully interactive. The designer noted any performance issues or visual glitches during the loading process.

Step 4: Take Screenshot - Copilot Dialog - Capture the Copilot dialog before dismissing it - An unwanted Copilot dialog appeared unexpectedly during the workflow. The designer had to manually dismiss this dialog to continue with the intended task. The designer observed the dialog's appearance timing, dismissal mechanism, and the disruption it caused to the natural workflow progression.

Step 5: Dismiss Copilot Dialog - Dismiss the 'Start with Copilot' dialog that appears when creating a new workbook - An unwanted Copilot dialog appeared unexpectedly during the workflow. The designer had to manually dismiss this dialog to continue with the intended task. The designer observed the dialog's appearance timing, dismissal mechanism, and the disruption it caused to the natural workflow progression.

Step 6: Take Screenshot - Initial State - Capture initial workbook state - The designer captured a screenshot for visual analysis and documentation purposes. The designer observed the quality and completeness of the captured visual state, noting any rendering issues or visual inconsistencies that might affect user perception of the interface.

Step 7: Enter Sample Data - Enter sample data in cells using canvas approach - The designer entered sample data into Excel cells using various input methods. The designer observed the responsiveness of the data entry process, visual feedback provided by the interface, and any issues with cell selection or text input functionality.

Step 8: Take Screenshot - Data Entered - Capture workbook with data entered - The designer captured a screenshot for visual analysis and documentation purposes. The designer observed the quality and completeness of the captured visual state, noting any rendering issues or visual inconsistencies that might affect user perception of the interface.

Step 9: Click Save Button - Click the save button to save the workbook - The designer clicked the save button to save the current workbook. The designer observed the save workflow, any dialogs that appeared during the save process, and the overall user experience during this critical operation. The designer noted the clarity of save status indicators and any unexpected interruptions.

Step 10: Take Screenshot - Final State - Capture final workbook state after save - The designer captured a screenshot for visual analysis and documentation purposes. The designer observed the quality and completeness of the captured visual state, noting any rendering issues or visual inconsistencies that might affect user perception of the interface.

base_craft_bugs.title: Overall Slow Performance
base_craft_bugs.description: Complete scenario took 70.1 seconds, which is too slow for good user experience
base_craft_bugs.recommendation: Optimize overall scenario performance to reduce total execution time

base_craft_bugs.title: Multiple Dialog Interruptions
base_craft_bugs.description: Scenario was interrupted by 2 dialogs, creating a fragmented user experience
base_craft_bugs.recommendation: Minimize dialog interruptions and implement smoother workflow transitions

enhanced_craft_bugs.title: Unwanted Copilot Interruption
enhanced_craft_bugs.description: During the "" step, the synthetic UX designer encountered an unexpected copilot that appeared without user initiation. This dialog interrupted the natural workflow progression, forcing the designer to divert attention from the primary task. The unexpected appearance created cognitive load as the designer had to process the new information and decide how to proceed. This disruption violates the principle of user control and freedom, as the designer was not given the choice to engage with the dialog or continue with their intended workflow. The dialog appeared to be system-initiated rather than user-requested, which can lead to user frustration and workflow abandonment.
enhanced_craft_bugs.recommendation: Make dialogs opt-in rather than automatic, provide clear dismissal options, or implement non-modal alternatives that don't interrupt workflow.
enhanced_craft_bugs.training_example_reference: Based on real-world dialog interruption issues from ADO bug database

enhanced_craft_bugs.title: Unwanted Save Interruption
enhanced_craft_bugs.description: During the "" step, the synthetic UX designer encountered an unexpected save that appeared without user initiation. This dialog interrupted the natural workflow progression, forcing the designer to divert attention from the primary task. The unexpected appearance created cognitive load as the designer had to process the new information and decide how to proceed. This disruption violates the principle of user control and freedom, as the designer was not given the choice to engage with the dialog or continue with their intended workflow. The dialog appeared to be system-initiated rather than user-requested, which can lead to user frustration and workflow abandonment.
enhanced_craft_bugs.recommendation: Make dialogs opt-in rather than automatic, provide clear dismissal options, or implement non-modal alternatives that don't interrupt workflow.
enhanced_craft_bugs.training_example_reference: Based on real-world dialog interruption issues from ADO bug database

enhanced_craft_bugs.title: LLM Detected: Copilot dialog box misaligned with the page grid
enhanced_craft_bugs.description: The Copilot dialog box appears slightly misaligned with the underlying spreadsheet grid, creating a visual imbalance. when viewing the interface. Expected: The dialog box should be centered and aligned with the grid for a cohesive appearance.
enhanced_craft_bugs.what_wrong: The Copilot dialog box appears slightly misaligned with the underlying spreadsheet grid, creating a visual imbalance.
enhanced_craft_bugs.expected: The dialog box should be centered and aligned with the grid for a cohesive appearance.
enhanced_craft_bugs.impact: Misalignment can distract users and affect the professional appearance of the interface.
enhanced_craft_bugs.spacing_measurement: Uneven spacing around the dialog box
enhanced_craft_bugs.prerequisites: Open spreadsheet with Copilot dialog active
enhanced_craft_bugs.visual_check: Observe the alignment of the dialog box with the grid
enhanced_craft_bugs.expected_result: Dialog box should be centered and aligned
enhanced_craft_bugs.actual_result: Dialog box appears slightly off-center
enhanced_craft_bugs.immediate_fix: Adjust the positioning of the Copilot dialog box
enhanced_craft_bugs.visual_target: Ensure alignment with the grid
enhanced_craft_bugs.testing_approach: Verify alignment visually in the spreadsheet view

enhanced_craft_bugs.title: LLM Detected: Insufficient color contrast in Copilot dialog text
enhanced_craft_bugs.description: The text within the Copilot dialog box has low contrast against the background, making it hard to read. when viewing the interface. Expected: Text should have sufficient contrast to ensure readability.
enhanced_craft_bugs.what_wrong: The text within the Copilot dialog box has low contrast against the background, making it hard to read.
enhanced_craft_bugs.expected: Text should have sufficient contrast to ensure readability.
enhanced_craft_bugs.impact: Low contrast can hinder readability, especially for users with visual impairments.
enhanced_craft_bugs.color_measurement: Light text on a light background
enhanced_craft_bugs.prerequisites: Copilot dialog box open
enhanced_craft_bugs.visual_check: Observe text contrast within the dialog
enhanced_craft_bugs.expected_result: Text should be easily readable
enhanced_craft_bugs.actual_result: Text is difficult to read due to low contrast
enhanced_craft_bugs.immediate_fix: Increase text contrast
enhanced_craft_bugs.visual_target: Ensure text meets accessibility contrast standards
enhanced_craft_bugs.testing_approach: Use contrast checking tools to verify compliance

enhanced_craft_bugs.title: LLM Detected: Inconsistent padding in Copilot dialog suggestions
enhanced_craft_bugs.description: The padding around the suggested prompts is inconsistent, leading to a cluttered appearance. when viewing the interface. Expected: Consistent padding should be applied for a neat and organized look.
enhanced_craft_bugs.visual_context: Located at the bottom of the dialog box
enhanced_craft_bugs.what_wrong: The padding around the suggested prompts is inconsistent, leading to a cluttered appearance.
enhanced_craft_bugs.expected: Consistent padding should be applied for a neat and organized look.
enhanced_craft_bugs.impact: Inconsistent padding can make the interface look unpolished and affect user experience.

enhanced_craft_bugs.expected_result: Even and consistent padding
enhanced_craft_bugs.actual_result: Padding is inconsistent
enhanced_craft_bugs.immediate_fix: Adjust padding around suggestions

enhanced_craft_bugs.title: LLM Detected: "Copilot dialog box misaligned with the page grid"
enhanced_craft_bugs.description: The Copilot dialog box appears slightly misaligned with the underlying spreadsheet grid, creating a visual imbalance. when viewing the interface. Expected: The dialog box should be centered or aligned consistently with the grid lines for a balanced appearance.
enhanced_craft_bugs.what_wrong: The Copilot dialog box appears slightly misaligned with the underlying spreadsheet grid, creating a visual imbalance.
enhanced_craft_bugs.expected: The dialog box should be centered or aligned consistently with the grid lines for a balanced appearance.
enhanced_craft_bugs.impact: Misalignment can distract users and affect the perceived professionalism of the interface.

enhanced_craft_bugs.expected_result: Dialog box should align with grid lines
enhanced_craft_bugs.actual_result: Dialog box appears slightly off-center
enhanced_craft_bugs.immediate_fix: Adjust the positioning of the dialog box
enhanced_craft_bugs.visual_target: Ensure alignment with grid lines
enhanced_craft_bugs.testing_approach: Verify alignment visually in the interface

enhanced_craft_bugs.title: LLM Detected: "Insufficient color contrast in Copilot dialog text"
enhanced_craft_bugs.description: The text within the Copilot dialog box has low contrast against its background, making it difficult to read. when viewing the interface. Expected: Text should have sufficient contrast to ensure readability.
enhanced_craft_bugs.what_wrong: The text within the Copilot dialog box has low contrast against its background, making it difficult to read.
enhanced_craft_bugs.expected: Text should have sufficient contrast to ensure readability.
enhanced_craft_bugs.impact: Low contrast can hinder readability, especially for users with visual impairments.

enhanced_craft_bugs.actual_result: Text is hard to read due to low contrast

enhanced_craft_bugs.testing_approach: Use contrast checking tools to verify compliance
